content.raw:
the regular homebrew job passed but it didn't have the protobuf gem installed, so I tested again with a custom release-tools branch

* https://bitbucket.org/osrf/release-tools/commits/60272c41b0ed8023784eec8dd2cc1010afde2249
* https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_msgs-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/37

homebrew has protobuf 3.5.1 and fails in the same way that @caguero described
